metadata.hours_of_work: A - SGEU Office 36 - one day off every two weeks

job_posting.ministry_description: The Ministry of Social Services, Income Assistance Programs Division, is seeking a professional, energetic, analytical, and methodical thinker to be part of the division’s Financial Operations Unit. You will be an integral member of the financial services team that is responsible for providing forecasting, budgeting and financial consulting expertise in support of the programs and strategic direction of the Ministry.

qualifications.education_requirements: Typically, knowledge for this position is gained through the successful completion of an undergraduate Degree in Commerce, Business Administration, or related discipline combined with an accounting designation. Equivalent combinations of education and experience will be considered. Candidates must clearly indicate in their cover letter or résumé where they have acquired the knowledge and abilities required for this position. Applications will be screened on the basis of this information.

additional.diversity_statement: We are committed to workplace diversity.
